claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Header from the CDC's Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR), showing the publication title, volume, issue number, and date. The image only displays the cover header of an MMWR report and contains no data or statements about cell- or egg-based flu vaccine production or associated mutations, so it does not support the claim.
